original_title: 生徒の巨乳に理性を失った僕は放課後ラブホで何度も何度もカレンと中出しセックスしてしまった 楪カレン
overview: The protagonist is a teacher who has a sassy student that very openly hits on him.  He initially rejects her, but this only increases her persistence, and she adopts a more radical approach.
title: I Lost Reason Because Of My Student's Big Tits And Creampie Fucked Karen Again And Again In A Love Hotel. Karen Yuzuriha
